<h3 id="X34620">X(34620) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE TO ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^4-(5*b^2-4*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2-2*(b+c)*b*c*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34620) = 2*X(20)+X(12513) = 3*X(376)-X(34619) = 4*X(550)-X(3913) = X(1657)+2*X(8666) = 5*X(3522)-2*X(12607) = X(3529)+2*X(3813) = 3*X(3534)-X(34707) = 4*X(4297)-X(12635) = 3*X(4421)-2*X(34619) = X(5073)-4*X(24387) = 3*X(11194)-X(34706) = 3*X(11235)-2*X(34706) = 3*X(34626)-2*X(34707) = X(34626)+2*X(34740) = X(34707)+3*X(34740)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34619)</p>
<p>X(34620) lies on these lines:
{1,28534}, {2,3614}, {3,535}, {20,528}, {30,10525}, {36,17556}, {55,20067}, {56,11114}, {376,529}, {405,4325}, {515,34700}, {516,34640}, {517,34710}, {518,34701}, {519,3534}, {527,4297}, {542,34704}, {550,3913}, {956,4316}, {958,4299}, {993,17528}, {1001,4293}, {1376,15326}, {1657,8666}, {2094,3486}, {2646,31164}, {2975,31140}, {3304,15680}, {3436,6174}, {3522,12607}, {3529,3813}, {3543,3829}, {3584,19704}, {3649,15678}, {3654,34717}, {3679,3916}, {3828,19706}, {3928,10085}, {4189,9657}, {4324,34719}, {4428,5434}, {5073,24387}, {5267,9655}, {5270,19535}, {5289,21578}, {5298,18961}, {5731,17768}, {6284,11240}, {6934,34746}, {6942,10711}, {7280,31160}, {8715,15696}, {9688,19028}, {9778,34711}, {10707,12953}, {11001,34625}, {11237,17549}, {12512,32049}, {12943,17577}, {13587,31141}, {15338,20076}, {17648,34716}, {19924,34672}, {24467,28204}</p>
<p>
X(34620) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 34610}, {3534, 34740}, {3928, 34628}, {11001, 34625}<br>
X(34620) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3543, 3829), (4421, 376), (11235, 11194), (11236, 3), (12513, 34610), (34626, 3534), (34717, 3654), (34739, 2)<br>
</p>
